markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Seedpod Spring](/Actions.aspx?ID=1653) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 107 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

A seedpod within the chair bursts and uncoils, releasing a light clump of cottony material. Your rootball chair [Leaps](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) up to 30 feet vertically or horizontally and drifts down, sinking 5 feet for every 5 feet traveled horizontally and causing you to take no [falling damage](/Rules.aspx?ID=402). The cottony material disperses when you land.
name: Seedpod Spring
